title: Login Music
body:
Hi there, I'm a MOBA player who recently started playing league, I'm very familiar with music and absolutely love the current login music. However the file in my data is a different song (piece) than what i am hearing. It would be great if someone could hep me with this. I absolutely love this music and would like to have it on my phone. Thank You.

Also, I'm sorry if this discussion is in the wrong board i wasn't sure where to put it. Thanks.

replies.body:
Hi Banana Knight!

You can find much of our music on the soundcloud page, available for free download:
https://soundcloud.com/leagueoflegends/sets

If you have spotify, a lot of tracks are on there as well. Search League of Legends and it should come up. Hope you find what you're looking for, thanks!
